rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious area with floor-to-ceiling windows and open to the balcony on one side. It is designed in traditional Kerala style with wooden beams and stone accents.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the open plan layout with a stone countertop and traditional Kerala design elements. Adjacent to the pantry.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A private bedroom with a spacious balcony for relaxation and Vastu-aligned positioning. It features floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.description: Dedicated study area with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows. This space incorporates traditional Kerala decor and modern ergonomics.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater room featuring a large screen area and comfortable seating. The design maintains traditional Kerala aesthetics with modern acoustics.

openings.description: Attached to the Guest Bedroom and Study/Workspace for natural ventilation and a scenic view. Compliant with Vastu principles.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in key living spaces to maximize light and adhere to traditional Kerala design principles.
